title: Golden Japanesque: A Splendid Yokohama Romance, Vol. 3 (Volume 3)
description: Thanks to Rintarou, Maria now sees both herself and the world around her in a new light-and is even entertaining thoughts of a genuine courtship! But as the two seriously consider taking the next step, not everyone is eager to see it happen. Between Maria’s worried mother, stifling social mores, and a suave womanizer ready to ruin a storybook romance, can Maria and Rintarou’s love over come all obstacles ?
author: Kaho Miyasaka
